Welcome to minecraftstatus’ documentation!

class minecraftstatus.MCStatus

The main MCStatus class.

async achievement(achievement: str)

Makes a request to the achievement endpoint. Parameters: ———– achievement: str name of the achievement to display.

Returns an io.BytesIO object co-relating the achievement image.

Raises: BadTextFormation if the characters passed aren’t between 1-30.

async get_server(ip_address: str)

Makes a request to the server status endpoint.

Parameters

ip_address (str IP address of the server.) –

Return type

ServerStatus

host
Type

The host of the server.

port
Type

The port of the server.

is_online
Type

True if the server is online, False otherwise.

latency
Type

The latency of the server.

max_players
Type

The maximum players of the server.

online_players
Type

The online players of the server.

motd
Type

The message of the day of the server.

favicon
Type

The base64 data of the favicon of the server.

game_map
Type

The game map of the server.

game_mode
Type

The game mode of the server.

----------
Raises `ServerNotFound` if the server is not found or is offline.
async get_server_card(ip_address: str)

Makes a request to the server status endpoint.

Parameters

ip_address (str IP address of the server.) –

Return type

io.BytesIO object co-relating the server card image.

Raises

BadTextFormation –

async splash_text(text: str)

Makes a request to the splash text endpoint. Parameters: ———– text: str text to display in the splash.

Returns an io.BytesIO object co-relating the splash image.

Raises: BadTextFormation if the characters passed aren’t between 1-30.
